author: robocopsgonemad
content: in older iterations of Hive, there was a `consensus` suite of tests, for example: https://hivetests.ethdevops.io/suite.html?suiteid=1735344263-8f090a206ce8461988a0e7ce7323060d.json&suitename=consensus

content: now looking at https://hivetests2.ethdevops.io/#summary-sort=name&group-by=client i'm not quite sure what the replacement is... would it be the engine-api and engine-cancun suites?
